creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: maroon body with green trim; short sleeves; open back; breast covering in front; human figure on each breast and three figures on proper left sleeve; four crescents on proper right sleeve; embroidery (predominantly gold), gold and silver trimmings, sequins, looped gold threads and beads
medium: Silk, metallic trims, metallic threads, beads, sequins; needlework
title: Woman's wedding blouse
